name: Camera 1.0
description: Manage the 360Fly device video configurations, settings and actions.

folders.name: Camera Projection
folders.description: Retrieve/Update the projection settings for the 360Fly device.

requests.name: Set/Update Scene Selection Command
requests.description:
Set/Update the scene selection setting for the 360Fly device.

* The _set/update scene selection_ command requires **authentication**.

##### __Command Data__

Characteristic | Values
--- | --- | ---
_scene_     |  Normal

* Note: Currently only the "normal" scene setting is supported. Additional scene values may be added in future releases ("indoor", low-light", etc.).

requests.name: Reset Device Tuning Parameters Command
requests.description:
Reset **all** device tuning parameters to the default state.

* The _reset device tuning parameters_ command requires **authentication**.

* The response to this command is a JSON object containing a list of the updated tuning parameters.

* Refer to the _**Retrieve Tuning Options**_ section for a list of the tuning setpoints.

requests.name: Retrieve Scene Selection Command
requests.description:
Retrieve the current scene selection setting for the 360Fly device.

* The _retrieve scene selection_ command requires **authentication**.

##### __Response Data__

Characteristic | Definition | Values
--- | --- | ---
_scene_     |   Current scene selection     |   Normal

* Note: Currently only the "Normal" scene setting is supported. Additional scene values may be added in future releases ("indoor", low-light", etc.).

requests.name: Retrieve Projection Information Command
requests.description:
Retrieves a JSON-encoded [PanoMeta](https://github.com/EyeSee360/panometa) projection information 
used by the 360Fly device. This information is embedded in the metadata for each mp4 video file generated.

* The _retrieve projection information_ command requires **authentication**.

##### __Response Data__

Characteristic | Definition | Values
--- | --- | ---
_panMin_        |   _**???**_               |   -180
_type_          |   Data configuration      |   Radial
_centerRadius_  |   _**???**_               |   0.500000 0.500000 0.500000 0.500000
_radialMapping_ |   _**???**_               |   Ftheta
_tiltRange_     |   _**???**_               |   180
_tiltMin_       |   _**???**_               |   -90
_orientation_   |   _**???**_               |   180
_outerAngle_    |   _**???**_               |   120
_panRange_      |   _**???**_               |   360

requests.name: Stop Recording Command
requests.description:
Stop the recording session.

* The _stop recording_ command supports _both_ **authenticated** and **non-authenticated** requests.

* Device _cannot_ be in UMS mode to perform this action.

* Additional Information
    * This command _will stop_ a recording is in progess. 
    * When a recording request exists but is not in progress (i.e. it is slotted to start at a later time), the recording request is cancelled.

requests.headers:
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46MDAwMDAwMDA=
requests.name: Start Recording Command
requests.description:
Start a recording session.

* The _start recording_ command supports _both_ **authenticated** and **non-authenticated** requests.

* Device _cannot_ be in UMS mode to perform this action.

* Use an "empty body" for simple record triggering (Use a `Content-length: 0` header for an empty request body).

requests.name: Retrieve Device Tuning Parameter Values Command
requests.description:
Retrieve the current tuning values used by the 360Fly device.

* The _retrieve device tuning parameter values_ command requires **authentication**.

* The response to this command is a JSON object containing:
    * The values of **All** tuning setpoints on the device if a specific setpoint is _not_ provided in the command (`/360fly/camera/tuning`).
    * The value of a **Single** tuning setpoint on the device if a setpoint is provided in the command (`/360fly/camera/tuning/parameter`).

* Refer to the _**Retrieve Tuning Options**_ section for a list of the tuning setpoints.

requests.name: Retrieve Active Recording Record Command
requests.description:
Retrieve the record of an ongoing recording.

* The _retrieve active recording record_ command supports _both_ **authenticated** and **non-authenticated** requests.
* Device _cannot_ be in UMS mode to perform this action.
* Returns a 204 (No Content) when no recording is active.

requests.name: Retrieve Liveview URL Command
requests.description:
Retrieves the URL address for a liveview stream.

* The _retrieve liveview url_ command supports _both_ **authenticated** and **non-authenticated** requests.

##### __Response Data__

Characteristic | Definition | Values
--- | --- | ---
_url_   |   URL address     |   "rtsp:\/\/192.168.2.1\/live1.sdp"

requests.name: Retrieve Scene Presets Command
requests.description:
Retrieve scene preset parameters for the 360Fly device.

* The _retrieve scene presets_ command requires **authentication**.

##### __Response Data__

Characteristic | Definition | Values
--- | --- | ---
_type_      |   Data type               |   String
_values_    |   Allowable scene presets |   Normal
_default_   |   Default scene preset    |   Normal

* Note: Currently only the "Normal" scene setting is supported. Additional scene values may be added in future releases ("indoor", low-light", etc.).

requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46MDAwMDAwMDA=
requests.name: Retrieve Tuning Options Command
requests.description:
Retrieve a list of scene tuning fields, types and associated values/ranges for the 360Fly device.

* The _retrieve tuning options_ command requires **authentication**.

* The response to this command is a JSON object containing:
    * The options for **All** tuning setpoints on the device if a specific setpoint is _not_ provided in the command (`/360fly/camera/tuning`).
    * The options for a **Single** tuning setpoint on the device if a setpoint is provided in the command (`/360fly/camera/tuning/parameter`).

##### __Response Data__

Characteristic | Definition |   Parameter   |   Value
--- | --- | --- | ---
_ae_lock_               |   Auto-exposure lock                  |   type    |   boolean
                        |                                       |   default |   0: unlocked
                        |                                       |           |   1: locked
_saturation_            |   Saturation setting                  |   type    |   integer
                        |                                       |   default |   1000
                        |                                       |   min     |   0
                        |                                       |   max     |   200
_max_iso_sensitivity_   |   Maximum ISO sensitivity             |   type    |   integer
                        |                                       |   default |   8000
                        |                                       |   min     |   1000
                        |                                       |   max     |   64000
_awb_lock_              |   Auto-white-balance Lock             |   type    |   boolean
                        |                                       |   default |   0: unlocked
                        |                                       |           |   1: locked
_brightness_            |   Brightness setting                  |   type    |   integer
                        |                                       |   default |   100
                        |                                       |   min     |   0
                        |                                       |   max     |   200
_ae_compensation_       |   Auto-exposure compensation setting  |   type    |   integer
                        |                                       |   default |   100
                        |                                       |   min     |   50
                        |                                       |   max     |   200
_contrast_              |   Contrast setting                    |   type    |   integer
                        |                                       |   default |   100
                        |                                       |   min     |   0
                        |                                       |   max     |   200

requests.name: Change A Device Tuning Parameter Value Command
requests.description:
Retrieve the current tuning values used by the 360Fly device.

* The _change a device tuning parameter value_ command requires **authentication**.

* The client can change one or more parameters in a single request.

* The response to this command is a JSON object containing the parameter values supplied in the request.

* Out-of-range/Invalid values are ignored.

* Refer to the _**Retrieve Tuning Options**_ section for a list of the tuning setpoints & allowable values.

requests.name: Retrieve Projection Options Command
requests.description:
Retrieve a list of settable projection fields, types and associated values for the 360Fly device.

* The _retrieve projection options_ command requires **authentication**.

##### __Response Data__

Characteristic | Parameter | Value
--- | --- | ---
_outerAngle_    |   type            |   float
                |   min             |   1
                |   max             |   120
                |   default         |   120
_radius_        |   type            |   string
                |   default         |   0.500000 0.500000
_center_        |   type            |   string
                |   default         |   0.500000 0.500000
_centerRadius_  |   type            |   string
                |   default         |   0.500000 0.500000 0.500000 0.500000

requests.name: Reset Projection Options Command
requests.description:
Reset the projection option parameters to an "un-calibrated" default state.

* The _reset projection options_ command requires **authentication**.

* Refer to the _**retrieve projection options**_ section for a list of parameters and default values.

requests.name: Test Camera Status Changed
requests.description: Simple test to verify status changed to recording

requests.headers:
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46MDAwMDAwMDA=
requests.name: Set/Update Projection Information Command
requests.description:
Set/Update the projection information for the 360Fly device.

* The _set/update projection information_ command requires **authentication**.

* Returns 403 (Forbidden) if the specified parameter(s) are invalid.

##### __Command Parameters__

Characteristic | Definition | Value (Range)
--- | --- | ---
_panMin_        |   _**???**_               |   -180 to +180
_type_          |   Data configuration      |   Radial
_centerRadius_  |   _**???**_               |   0.0 to 1.0 _(all four fields)_
_radialMapping_ |   _**???**_               |   Ftheta
_tiltRange_     |   _**???**_               |   _**???**_ 
_tiltMin_       |   _**???**_               |   _**???**_
_orientation_   |   _**???**_               |   _**???**_
_outerAngle_    |   _**???**_               |   _**???**_
_panRange_      |   _**???**_               |   0 to 360
